mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.NOTICE_CONTENT, N.USER_NO, M.USER_ID, N.COUNT, N.CREATE_DATE, N.MODIFY_DATE, N.STATUS FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_NO, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.NOTICE_CONTENT, N.USER_NO, M.USER_ID, N.COUNT, N.CREATE_DATE, N.MODIFY_DATE, N.STATUS FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE N.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, N.NOTICE_NO, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.NOTICE_CONTENT, N.USER_NO, M.USER_ID, N.COUNT, N.CREATE_DATE, N.MODIFY_DATE, N.STATUS FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, USER_NO, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{userNo}, 0, SYSDATE, NULL, 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
